participant_1.background:
I love spending time with my kids, especially when we're baking together.
i can t sing very well.
i am writing my first novel and hope to finish before the end of the year.
I'm going to make my grandson a chocolate cake and brew a batch of beer.
i try to watch what i eat.

participant_2.background:
I would like to have a job where I can use my creativity and technical skills.
I'm doing okay in school, though I'm a bit worried about my upcoming exams.
I cooked a variety of Thai dishes for my family and friends while on vacation.
i hate popcorn.
I am afraid that my anxiety will prevent me from achieving my goals.

content.text: Hello! How are you today?
I'm doing alright. A bit worried about my exams coming up, but otherwise good!
I'm sorry to hear that. What kind of exams are you taking?
I have math and English exams next week.
Oh, those can be tough. I'm sure you'll do great though!
Thanks, I hope so!
What are you hoping to do after school?
I'm not sure yet, but I'd like to do something where I can use my creativity and technical skills.
That sounds like a good goal. I'm sure you'll find something you're passionate about.
Thanks, I hope so!
What's your favorite thing to do when you're feeling stressed?
I like to bake or cook. It helps me relax and I always feel better afterwards.
That sounds like a great way to de-stress. I love baking too!
Me too! It's so much fun to create something delicious and share it with others.
I agree! And it always tastes better when you make it yourself.
Yes, it does!
What's your favorite thing to bake?
I love making chocolate cake. It's so easy to make and it always turns out delicious.
Chocolate cake is my favorite too! I love the rich chocolate flavor.
Me too! It's so decadent and satisfying.
I'm glad we agree on something!
Me too! I'm sure we'd have a lot of fun baking together.
I agree! We should definitely do that sometime
